root.name: Cy Girls
root.description: Overview Japanese/PAL box art Cy Girls is a third-person action game developed and published by Konami for the PlayStation 2. The game is based off of a line of Japanese action figured by Takara Tomy and features two main characters, Ice and Aska. The game is split into two discs, with one disc for each character. Aska's disc focuses on her story and is focused on melee combat, whereas Ice's story focuses on firearms combat. Both stories implemented puzzle solving into the game's progression and both discs also include a series of bonuses and unlockable modes that can be played upon completion of a character's story. The game was released in Japan on February 19th, 2004 and was localized and released in North America on March 23, 2004. Europe received the game later on May 7th, 2004.
